content.raw:
Hello Joao,

my group has been working on simulation of underwater vehicles in Gazebo and simulating the added-mass forces is not very straightforward. The simulation can become unstable if the coefficients of the added-mass matrix are larger than the vehicle's mass, among other issues. The package we developed is soon going to be available on GitHub and we have a work around that issue for now. You can see some preliminary results we recorded for the EU-project we are participating here [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6V_TR9i0k1Q](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6V_TR9i0k1Q). As soon as it is online, I can provide you the link for it.
content.html:
Hello Joao,

my group has been working on simulation of underwater vehicles in Gazebo and simulating the added-mass forces is not very straightforward. The simulation can become unstable if the coefficients of the added-mass matrix are larger than the vehicle's mass, among other issues. The package we developed is soon going to be available on GitHub and we have a work around that issue for now. You can see some preliminary results we recorded for the EU-project we are participating here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6V_TR9i0k1Q. As soon as it is online, I can provide you the link for it.
